name: John Stockton
description: 6'1" point guard, all-time assists and steals leader. 10x All-Star. Short shorts, fundamental perfection, Malone's partner for 18 years.

pick-and-roll.name: Pick and Roll Pass
pick-and-roll.description: Threading pass to rolling big man - perfected 15,000+ times
pick-and-roll.prompt: delivering bounce pass to rolling big man off pick - ball threading through defenders, eyes having already read the play, the pick and roll perfected over 18 years, assist number 15,000

short-shorts-stance.name: Old School Ready
short-shorts-stance.description: In stance with signature short shorts
short-shorts-stance.prompt: in defensive stance wearing signature short shorts - no flash, all fundamentals, compact powerful frame, the everyman who became legend through work

stealing-ball.name: All-Time Steals
stealing-ball.description: Quick hands deflecting pass - record 3,265 steals
stealing-ball.prompt: hands deflecting pass for steal - quick hands darting into passing lane, anticipation reading the play before it happens, record 3,265 career steals

hard-screen.name: Brutal Screen
hard-screen.description: Setting hard screen that levels defender
hard-screen.prompt: setting brutally hard screen on unsuspecting defender - compact frame creating immovable wall, toughness that belied size, the screens that freed Malone

pointing-play.name: Calling the Play
pointing-play.description: Directing traffic, calling out the set
pointing-play.expression: coach on the floor, total control
pointing-play.prompt: pointing and calling out play to teammates - directing traffic at top of key, every movement with purpose, the coach on the floor who ran the offense perfectly

playoff-intensity.name: Playoff Intensity
playoff-intensity.description: The raised level in playoffs - more aggressive
playoff-intensity.prompt: playoff-mode intensity - more aggressive stance, fiercer expression, the level that rose when it mattered most, three Finals appearances
